body.name: Honeywell Air Purifiers for Home Bedroom, Living Room, Kitchen & Dorm Room (100 sq ft), Dual Action Air Filter Helps Capture Dust, Pollen, Pet Dander & Smoke, HHT270, Tabletop, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 17 hrs 20 mins
features: SMALL ROOM AIR PURIFIER – Honeywell HHT270 Tabletop Air Purifier helps provide cleaner, fresher air. Recommended for small rooms (100 sq. ft.). Helps capture the following microscopic airborne particles: dust, pollen, pet dander, dust mite debris & smoke.
HELPS REDUCE ALLERGENS – This quiet air purifier has 3 levels of cleaning power to capture the following microscopic airborne particles: dust, pollen, pet dander, dust mite debris and smoke.

EFFECTIVE AIR CLEANING & CIRCULATION – The Honeywell HHT270 Air Purifier filters and circulates air in small 100 sq. ft. rooms up to 4.8x an hour. Plus, it features a filter check/reset light that tells you when it’s time to change your filter.
ENERGY EFFICIENT – This Honeywell Air Purifier earned the ENERGY STAR label by meeting strict energy efficient guidelines set by the U.S. EPA.

COMPATIBLE DOES NOT MEAN COMPARABLE – For best performance, use only genuine Honeywell air purifier filters. Compatible air purifier filter replacements are not guaranteed to offer the same performance or efficiency. Search for HRF201B, “U” filters.
body.description: This Honeywell HHT270 Air Purifier includes a Genuine Honeywell Filter that helps capture the following microscopic airborne particles: dust, pollen, pet dander, dust mite debris and smoke.* Recommended for small 100 sq. ft. rooms. This Honeywell Air Purifier can filter and circulate air up to 4.8 times an hour.** If you have pets or stale indoor air, air purifiers can help deliver cleaner, fresher air. This Honeywell Air Purifier earned the ENERGY STAR label by meeting strict energy efficient guidelines set by the U.S. EPA. Always purchase Genuine Honeywell replacement air purifier filters. They are certified to help capture odors and the following microscopic allergens and particles: dust, pollen, pet dander, dust mite debris, and smoke.* Other compatible filter replacements are not guaranteed to offer the same performance or efficiency. Disclaimers:*From the air that passes through the filter, 2 microns and larger. ** Based on 3rd party independent CADR testing for the smoke CADR value when operated at the highest level. Air circulation depends on many factors, such as room size and configuration. There is no guarantee that all of the air in a room will pass through the filter. The ENERGY STAR name and mark are registered trademarks owned by the U.S. EPA.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Honeywell HHT270W HEPAClean Tabletop Room Air Purifier, Small Room Captures fine airborne particles such as dust, pollen, smoke and pet dander from the air passing through the HEPAClean filterManual control3 air cleaning levelsElectronic filter change reminderDual action HEPA-type filter includes activated carbon pre-filter layer to help reduce odorsReplace HEPA-Type filter every 4 months

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great air cleaner that is relatively quiet, easy to use and filters out all the odors and dust quickly and efficiently. Plus it's really easy to find replacement filters at a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional! Does its' job perfectly!
reviews.reviewText: After Covid my wife's job moved to a work from home model. We had to move her into an unused closet for an office due to not wanting to rearrange the house. That has worked really well but there are no air vents in there. This caused the air to stagnate and dust became a problem in there. This little machine removed 90% of the dust (even from surfaces) in 24 hours. After a few days it was completely gone. I feel like it also moves the air and pulls air in the room if only a small amount. It is a great device. It is very quiet and my wife can take phone calls with it on high about 3 feet away. We have a Honeywell HEPA in every room and I can't imagine life without them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great design, quiet operation
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my bedroom and I immediately loved the design and size of this product before I even plugged it in. It has three different fan settings and even on the highest setting, its pretty quiet. I plan to buy a second one for my living room. I'm highly satisfied with this little air purifier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value but too noisy on higher settings
reviews.reviewText: This is an economical & efficient purifier. I bought it to reduce dust in my closet & am very pleased. I ran it for a while on high to clean the air throughout, and then lowered it to low for maintenance. The low setting is quiet enough. Recommended for this kind of purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have 2 of these units. I bought the first one for my son’s dorm room. I purchased another for his bedroom at home. It is definitely great for small rooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Xcelent Purchase! Xcellent Performance.
reviews.reviewText: We have Two of the same... bought xtra Filters for future use. Noise level... on HIGH I don't mind... lower settings I honestly do not notice it.I changed a filter after a recent VERY dusty home improvement project and it was amazing what the Filter looked like! REALLY caught ALOT from the air. VERY Happy with the Purchase and in the Kitchen it really helps to eliminate the cooking odors...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This works great!! After plugging it in and letting it run all day. Air smelled so fresh and clean in my bedroom. The noise from the machine isn't bad at all I keep mine on medium, high makes a little more noise than I like. I sleep just fine with it on medium at night and the noise does not bother me at all. The low setting you can barely even tell its on. I'm going to be buying a few more for my other rooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and cleans the air.
reviews.reviewText: Good quality and cleans the air. This was purchased for my senior mother's bedroom. The unit is powerful enough to continuously freshen the air of her 8 X 10
Esta de muy buen tamaño excelente calidad.
Excelente calidad y fácil de usar

reviews.reviewTitle: Buenas relación calidad precio, pero ruidoso
reviews.reviewText: Es de buena calidad considerando el precio. Los filtros no son costosos, lo cuál es muy bueno. Compré este purificador para usarlo por las noches principalmente, pero es muy ruidoso. Nada recomendable para usarlo durante las noches.
